adjectives.description: carbonated (comparative more carbonated, superlative most carbonated)

entries.meaning: Containing carbon dioxide gas under pressure, especially pertaining to beverages, as natural mineral water or man-made drinks.
examples: Soda pop, lemon soda and soda water are carbonated drinks. Champagne and beer are naturally carbonated through fermentation.

entries.meaning: (mineralogy) Containing calcium carbonate, often as a result of mineral carbonation.
simple past tense and past participle of carbonate
